about.opensource: win11React is an open source project made in the hope to replicate the Windows 11 desktop experience on web, using standard web technologies like React, CSS, and JavaScript.
about.notmicrosoft: This project is not in anyway affiliated with Microsoft and should not be confused with Microsoft's Operating System or Products.
about.title: About
about.microsoftcopywrite: Microsoft, Windows and Other demonstrated Products in this project are trademarks of the Microsoft group of companies
store.featured-app.info: Data visualization, 3D Rendering,... any heavy workload run on cloud
store.featured-game.info: AAA gaming from your browser without download
oobe.country: Is this the right country or region?
oobe.keyboard: Is this the right keyboard layout or input method?
oobe.anotherkeyboard: If you also use another keyboard layout, you can add that next

error.suggest: Please reload and try it again, in fews minutes
error.NOT_ALLOW: Your account doesn't register our services
error.run_out_of_gpu_stock: We've run out of Gpu stock, please contact with us
error.NOT_READY: Installing, wait 3-5' until game logo appears
error.NOT_RUNNING: Game is pasued or installing, run 'Start app' to open
error.NOT_PAUSED: Game is running or installing, try again!
error.PAUSED: Game is pasued or installing, try again!
error.NOT_PINGED: Game is pasued, reload and run Start app!
error.IS_LOCKED: Your data is uploading to cloud, please wait a fews minutes

info.startApp: It take a fews minutes. Please pause app when not using
info.installApp: It take a fews minutes, wait until logo appears
info.pauseApp: Tips, Right click => start app to play continuously
info.thankParaphrase: Your feedback helps us so much for improvement!, Luv <3
